Key:
*sigh* I finally made it.
I'm definitely late...

(Today, I promised to go on a date with Miku.
Because of her hectic schedule, it's something
of a tryst. She's always on the move.)

Even though I was carefully checking my watch
to make sure I wouldn't be late, I never could've
expected there to be an accident on the road.

I didn't think I'd be this late...
Miku didn't go home, did she?
Ah, daaaarliiing. Over here!

Thank goodness... She's here. Sorry for
keeping you waiting!

No no, it's all right. It can't be helped if
there was trouble.

I'm really sorry... Wait, huh? I thought our
date today was secret. You're wearing your
normal clothes. Don't you need a disguise?

Hmph. Goodness, darling. We rendezvous
and all you talk about is my outfit? Isn't
there something else you want to say?

Oogh. That's right... I shouldn't be asking when
I was the late one—

Noooot thaaaat! I said it couldn't be helped,
right?
Huh, really? Then, what...?

Goodness. You truly are a big doofus, darling.
I can't believe it. A girl's gone and gotten all
dressed up, but you barely noticed, you know?
Y-You're right, but... you know...
No ifs, ands, or buts!
You look cute today, Miku.
...That won't do. Once more, with feeling.

Er, ah, well... For me, it's a given that you're
cute, so I guess the thought hadn't crossed
my mind.
Darling... How precious.

Um, I'm sorry for not being a more thoughtful
boyfriend.

No, the fact that you love me, darling...
is more than enough for me to understand.
This thought alone fills me with bliss.
Thanks, Miku. I'm really happy, too.
Darling!
Miku!
Hey, could that be...
The idol, Miku Izayoi?
It seriously is...

Oh crap. Did they spot us?! Let's go, Miku!
Over here!
Eeeek! You're so pushy, darling!

(Pulling Miku by the hand, we bolted from
that spot. Jeez, dating her has been a
whirlwind from the start.)
We should be fine right here...

Goodness, darling. I've said this before, but
I don't mind who knows about us at all, okay?

After all, you are the person to whom I've
promised my future, darling.

Wait, wait. I did say that I would care for you,
Miku, but I don't remember anything about
promising our futures.

Whaaaat?! So that means, our relationship
was just a fling for you, then.
*sniffle, sniffle*...
Wha? I didn't say that!
Are you suuure? Are you really serious about me?
Yes, you're always on my mind.
Do you promise to always treasure me?

Yes, I'll always treasure you. I can promise
you that.
Then, our futures together...

Gaaaah, you almost got me again! That's
still too soon for us, in many ways!

Goodness, time only moves forward.
You worry too much about the details, darling.

(I-Is that true? I think it's bigger than just a
detail. I wonder what the difference is to Miku.)

Well, either way, we'd better get going. There's
a store you wanted to check out today, right?

Yes, that's right～. It has plenty of cute
accessories, and it's very close to here.
All right, then let's go. Right away.

Hmph. You're not trying to fool me, are you
darling?

I-I swear I'm not! I was late, remember? We
don't have much time!
...I suppose that's true. I understand.

(Whew. Still, I wonder what's wrong with Miku
today. She's acting different than usual.)

Wow! What a collection of accessories!
Certainly makes the trip worth it!

(This sales rack would catch the eye of any girl
who walks by. Surprisingly, there's just as
many guys as girls. Mostly in couples, though.)

(I see Miku bouncing happily from shelf to
shelf. All of the customers here seem to be
smiling, too.)

Well, with that excited look on her face,
I guess they won't notice that she's Miku
Izayoi from the TV.
Darling, darling! Please come over here!

I can hear you without you shouting. I'm
not going anywhere.

Aw, someone's being grumpy again. I wasn't
even being that loud.
Sure sounded pretty loud... Good grief.

(But if she's that happy, then coming here
together was worth it.)
What are you looking at?

See, this coffee cup. It comes in a set. Isn't
it so cute?
I see. It is pretty cute.

(Miku was looking at a coffee cup. It was
packaged with a matching saucer and a teaspoon.
It was a set of two, potentially for couples.)

(It was on the pricier side, but if it made
Miku happy, it would be the perfect gift.)

Then, it'll be my present to you, in celebration
of today. Perfect, isn't it?

Huh? Darling...? Does this mean what I think
it means?

Uh, what does it mean? What are you talking
about?

Well, buying matching tableware...
You know what that means, don't you?

Living together... Ack, wait!
N-No, that's not how I meant it!

Hee hee. Buying tableware together as a
couple is romantic, isn't it?

(Oh, I see. That explains all the couples in
the store. I'm starting to get uncomfortable.)

Oh, darling. How about these plates over here?
They're to die for.

(Oogh. I'm hearing everything she's saying in
a new light now.)
Y-Yeah. You're right. It's pretty cool.

Oh? You aren't saying it again, huh? That
you'll get one for me as a present.

Urgh. Miku, you're trying to pull a fast one
on me, aren't you?

Huhhh? What are you talking about?
I haven't said anything at all.
(Damn it. I can see her holding back laughter.)

Um. Is there something in particular you're
looking for?
Oh, no. We're just looking around.

Are you two possibly students?
How nice, you're so lovey-dovey.

That's riiiiight. He said to me that, once we
graduate, we're going to live together.
What?!
My, how wonderful!

U-Um, she's just joking.
And we've only just started seeing each other...
We have plenty of customers like that here.
Erm?!

You know what they say. Age is just a number.
Several of our patrons here are in the same
position as you.
See, I knew it!

(Hello, earth to the store attendant! I get
being good at the upsell, but this is
ridiculous!)

Truthfully, although the day for us may soon
come, he... hasn't come to a decision yet.
What can I do?
I believe you need a big push for that.
A big push, you say... Carry on.
Men nowadays seem so terrified of commitment...
I see...

Gaah! That's enough, thanks. Come on, Miku.
Let's go!
Aww, darling! You're so mean!

We always have the perfect products in stock,
so please visit us again soon!
Whew. I panicked. That was a close call.
I wanted to keep browsing...

Sorry about that. I just couldn't handle the
vibe there. It felt like a little too much too
soon.

It wouldn't be so embarrassing if you just
act more confident. However, that can't be
helped. Oh well, on to the next place～!

Hey, Miku. Is there something special about
today's date?
Huh? Umm, what do you mean...?

It feels like everything is conspiring to have
us live together.

That's not true. It's just your imagination,
darling. ♪
I-I see...

More importantly, there's something I want
right now. If I asked you, would you buy it for
me?

Huh...? Well, if it's something you want,
or something I can afford, then sure, but
couldn't you easily buy it yourself?

There'd be no point if I bought it myself...
It has to a present from you, darling.

No point if you bought it yourself...
Do you mean...?

(Suddenly, as I followed Miku's gaze, I saw
a somewhat upscale jewelry shop. Something
that means more coming from me, could it be?!)
Do you possibly mean... an engagement ring?
Is that no good...?
It's not a matter of good or not, it's just...
Isn't it still early?
I'm not prepared yet.

Hey, Miku.
I think it's a little too early for that.

I thought as much. It's expensive, so the
prospect isn't so easy. Too bad～

No, please listen. I want to be there for you
and take care of you, so, well...

Even if I am a student, I'm still a kid, so I
want you to wait until I can provide for you
properly, Miku.

Once I become worthy of you, then I'll come
back to you. Is that... not okay?

...Miku? Is something wrong? Your face is
all red.
Er, ah, eek! I-It's nothing at all...

Er, nothing at all... It doesn't seem like
nothing.
I-It really is nothing!
G-Got it. If you say so. So, is that okay?
Huh...? Is what okay?

Er, well, what I was just talking about. Were
you listening? It's kinda embarrassing for me,
but I can say it again...

N-No, you can't! I was listening properly!
I was listening! Those sorts of things, if
you repeat them too much...
If I repeat them too much...?

Erm, well, it'll ruin it! Important things only
need to be said once. That's what makes
them special...

(Special, because they only need to be said
once... I see. Guess that makes sense.)
Right, I'll be more careful from now on.
Yes, please do.
Did you hear that just now?
Right in public and everything.

Students these days are getting out of hand...
Seriously, they're so young.
F-For now, Miku... Let's move somewhere else.
Sorry, Miku. I'm not prepared for that yet.

Don't worry, darling. I know you're a late
bloomer.
But... it's too bad...

Sorry. I want to provide for you, Miku. That
much is true. Even if your fans discover me, and
they threaten to beat me up, I won't run away.
*snort, snicker*... Aha, hahahaha!
...Huh? Miku?

Oh, darling. Of course I'm joking. I don't think
I could get married so easily either. Don't you
worry.

Wha? Ah, so it was a joke... I thought you
were being serious.

I'm sorry. I just wanted to tease you a bit,
darling.
I-I see...

But if you had said you would marry me,
even if you knew it'd be impossible now,
I would have been on top of the world, you know?

Oogh, I'm sorry. I couldn't show you that side
of myself.

It's all right. I am pleased to have learned
that you think of me seriously, darling.
Thank you, darling. ♪

Of course. Thanks for putting up with such
a disappointing boyfriend.
Goodness, truly so... Hee hee hee.
Hahahaha!

Now then, where to after this? Since we're
here, I'll let you go ahead with whatever
you had planned for today.

Um, darling? Instead of the ring, I have a
single request. Is that okay?

A request in place of a ring? Sure, but...
What is it?
That's...
(Miku whispered her request into my ear.)

Well, hm. I did say that I'd do anything in
place of a ring, but...
Is it no good?
All right, then. Miku, give me your hand.
L-Like this?

(Miku's request was to kiss her finger on her
left hand, where her ring would go. Likely a
gesture of undying love.)

Yes. It's wonderful. Um, if you could, please
say something charming.

Something charming, huh? Have something
in mind? I'd appreciate it if it were simple.

Hmm, let me see... Say something cool!
Think of what a prince would say.

(The bar has just been raised. W-Well, can't
be helped. Girlfriend gets what girlfriend
wants.)

Oof, let me see. A toast... to your eyes.
Like that?
Not exactly...
(No good, huh. Tough crowd I guess.)
Hmm, um... T-To eternal love, with you...
...Yes. darling.

(With my statement, I offered a reverent kiss
to Miku's hand. The thought came too late, but
I realized that I was doing this in public.)
Thank you, darling. I'm so very happy.
Um. Are we all good now?
Aww, just a little longer pleeeease.

All right, all right. I understand, princess.
As you wish.

(For now, this is as much as I can do,
but I have to become a man worthy of
Miku. One day.)
More importantly...
My, get a room, why don't you?!

Right out in broad daylight. My heavens, the
scandal...

Young people, nowadays... Truly the end
of times.

Them again... It's no use. Let's get out of
here, Miku!
Aw, darling! You're so fast!

(And so, for the umpteenth time today, the
two of us grabbed each other's hands and
started running.)
